item.title: About
item.description: Hi I am Harsh Rohila, working as a Software Engineer This blog is to share what I learned from my experience in this field. My Experience I started with learning JavaScript and got to work on an Ember.js project. If you don’t know Ember.js it is an underrated frontend framework with principle of convention over configuration After learning Ember.js, I started looking into other Frontend frameworks. Now I use Stencil.js to build web components
